abstract: When the composer and philanthropist Peter Buffett holds a “concert and conversation” next month in Los Angeles, a special guest will appear: his father, Warren.
snippet: When the composer and philanthropist Peter Buffett holds a “concert and conversation” next month in Los Angeles, a special guest will appear: his father, Warren.
lead_paragraph: When the composer and philanthropist Peter Buffett holds a “concert and conversation” next month in Los Angeles, a special guest will appear: his father, Warren.

headline.main: No Jimmy Buffett, Just Warren and Son
headline.print_headline: No Jimmy Buffett, Just Warren and Son
